ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: well, kick is a damage only skill. slam is a racial skill for large races. Its the same as bash but large races dont need a shield to do it. slam/bash doesnt
ygData.messageBody:
well, kick is a damage only skill.
slam is a racial skill for "large" races.
Its the same as bash but large races dont need a shield to do it.
slam/bash doesnt do as much damage, what id does is stun the opponent if
lucky, this is great when fighting magic users and when running away from a
nasy mob.

vashi

>From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
>What is the difference between Slam and Bash? I have been bashing everyone
>like crazy trying to get it up to the same level as my kick, and now I find
>out that I might be wasting my time. I am a Barbarian Princess, so
>slamming
>people around is right in my league, but just what is the difference?
